h1_title: How to Unlock the Secret Ending (True Ending)
h2_title: Unlock and Complete Purple Cloud Mountain (Chapter 4)
content: In Chapter 4, fighting the Venom Daoist twice will grant you access to Purple Cloud Mountain. Here, you'll find 3 bosses to take on to complete the section.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Secret_Ending_(True_Ending).md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Secret Ending (True Ending)', specifically from the subsection 'Unlock and Complete Purple Cloud Mountain (Chapter 4)'.
The content is as follows:
In Chapter 4, fighting the Venom Daoist twice will grant you access to Purple Cloud Mountain. Here, you'll find 3 bosses to take on to complete the section.
